title: Dave Verellen from Botch/Narrows
itunes:title: Dave Verellen from Botch/Narrows
description:
One afternoon I had the pleasure of speaking to Dave Verellen, the vocalist of Botch and Narrows, over the phone. We discussed many different things like the unintended beginnings of Botch, legacy and continuing to stay involved with music as you grow older. Brought to you in conjunction with Propertyofzack.comPlease donate to the show! 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
